casebody.data:
No. 10-1322. DIRECTV, Inc., et al., Petitioners v. Richard A. Levin, Tax Commissioner of Ohio. 565 U.S. 809, 132 S. Ct. 82,

181 L. Ed. 2d 13,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 7005. October 3, 2011.

The Solicitor General is invited to file a brief in this case expressing the views of the United States.

Same case below, 128 Ohio St. 3d 68, 941 N.E.2d 1187.
